item.title: More than half a million people across Gaza are facing "catastrophic" conditions characterised by "starvation, destitution and death", the Integrated Food Security Phase Classification says. The report by the UN-backed body was labelled an "outright lie"
item.description: More than half a million people across Gaza are facing "catastrophic" conditions characterised by "starvation, destitution and death", the Integrated Food Security Phase Classification says. The report by the UN-backed body was labelled an "outright lie"

item.title: UN chief Antonio Gutteres said the famine confirmed in Gaza City and its surrounding areas was a "man-made disaster". The report was labelled an "outright lie" by Israel, which has denied there is starvation in the territory. #Israel #Gaza #MiddleEast #Mi
